img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 55.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ef/Wukong_LowerHollow_55.jpg)
In this form, he'll start by performing a series of charge attacks after stamping the ground to cause muddy geysers to erupt all around.
img_below_text:
When he begins to charge, you can still sprint out of the way, but you'll need to act fast.
![Wukong LowerHollow 57.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9b/Wukong_LowerHollow_57.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong" where the character Zhu Bajie is engaged in a battle. The preceding text describes Zhu Bajie performing charge attacks and causing muddy geysers to erupt, while the following text advises players to sprint out of the way when he begins to charge. The image likely captures a moment during this intense combat sequence, highlighting the need for quick reflexes and strategic movement.
